title: Bike check: Jai Hindley’s Tour de France Stage 5-winning Specialized Tarmac SL7
content:
A breakdown of Jai Hindley's Specialized S-Works Tarmac SL7 which he rode to win Stage 5 of the 2023 Tour de France.

Read the full article at Bike check: Jai Hindley’s Tour de France Stage 5-winning Specialized Tarmac SL7 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
